cause.description:
The goal of this group is to end the waste and excess of democracy in favor of the benevolent absolute rule of Bill Kephart.
1. Democracy as a form of government has outlived its own effectiveness
2. The ideal government would be an absolute state with a philosopher king at its head
3. Bill Kephart is currently the most qualified man in the world to fill the position of philosopher king
cause.mission: Establish a one world authoritarian government
cause.name: End Democracy
